summary:
Add some spells to return to temple of nine-divines.
To leran these spell, to activate Shrine of nines in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Add some spells to return to temple of nine-divines.
To leran these spell, to activate Shrine of nines in Skyrim.

Shrine of Mara teach you spell returning to Temple of Mara in Riften,
Shrine of Talos teach you spell returning to Temple of Talos in Windhelm.
Shrine of Dibella teach you spell returning to Temple of Dibella in Markarth
Shrine of Kynareth teach you spell returning to Temple of Kynareth in whiterun.
The other shrines teach you spell returning to Temple of Divine in Solitude are available.
When you\'ll remember one spell, simultaneously you\'ll forget the other spells.

These spell are active only in place where you can fast-travel.
(By this reason, without optional file, No-FastTravel-Mod disturb these spell)
To cancel this limit, console \"Set ForceIntervention to 1\".
********Warning********
This option can break in-game script, quest, and others. Be careful.

This mod will conflicts with other mods which change Effect of nine-divine\'s Altar.
author: Rikudou
